name: tangled-web-components
tagline: Web components for drawing graphs...  and some more.
body:
# tangled-web-components skatejs + d3 + math â†’ graph (as in graph theory) web components. #### ~ very experimental ~ As well as a very special and original `puppy-dog` element, a `handle-box` element, a fancy algorithm for calculating the intersection of a line and a rectangle, and some colorful, smudgy images made in krita. ## But don't take my word for it. [See for yourself...](examples) ## Notes ##### Try the examples locally: ```bash % npm -g install superstatic % superstatic ``` Then open the browser to `http://localhost:3474/examples/`. ##### Compile: ```bash % npm install % npm run build ``` ## Examples A dog on a scooter. ```html ``` Three dogs on scooters in a totally connected graph: ```html ``` Using an adjacency matrix to define the edges. ```html [[0,1,0],[0,0,1],[1,0,0]]
reduce
reuse
recyle
 ``` The `handle-box` element makes its contents draggable: ```html

grab this

grab this

 ``` Okay! Hope you enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
